resources.string: The %1$s slot is replaced by Mi Roaming
"Couldn't connect to the network to activate Mi Roaming"
Congratulations on safe landing! Try Mi Roaming.
Select the SIM card you want to turn off
Mi Roaming app data is corrupted. Close the app, open it again, connect to the internet, and restore the data.
The data package you purchased is available now.
Submitted successfully. Thanks for your support!
"Couldn't buy data package. The order will be refunded automatically. View purchase history?"
Home screen shortcut allows you to manage Mi Roaming faster and more efficiently
Mi Roaming card was sent to your device. Activate your order
Turn on Mi Roaming after you arrive at your destination.
Connection speed of your order has been limited.
"You don't have enough mobile data on your balance."
Try turning on Mi Roaming again.
All the required permissions were given.
Give Mi Roaming the required networking permissions in Security.
You should turn off Airplane mode before turning off Mi Roaming. Turn off now?
Turn off Airplane mode before using Mi Roaming
Mi Roaming is on. Revoking authorization requires turning off Mi Roaming.
Turn off the Mi Roaming and switch back to local data.
Turn off Mi SIM before using Mi Roaming. Turn off now?
Disable your current data package to use a different one. Disable now?
Install Mi Pay to complete payment.
"This item isn't available at the moment."
"Couldn't request refund. Data package has already been activated."
"Couldn't request refund. Contact our support team."
"Looks like you don't have permission to use the Beta version of this feature."
Make sure you use the mobile data before it expires
"Make sure you've filled in all the required fields."
This data package is only provided to new users. Make sure you use it before it expires.
There are free Wi-Fi networks nearby
"Your phone isn't connected to the network. To view this info, visit %s on a connected device."
"Press and hold to open the log's folder: MIUI/debug_log/bugreport***.zip"
"Press and hold to open the log's folder: diag_logs/"
"Press and hold to open the log's folder: mtklog/"
You can manage your Mi Fan card here.
Mi SIM error occurred. Reboot your device to fix the error. Reboot now?
Connect to the network and try again.
Send an email to service.global@xiaomi.com if you have any questions.
Mi Roaming needs autostart permissions to make sure it works normally after your device reboots. Give Mi Roaming the required permissions in Security.
Mobile data is turned off. Turn on now?
Mi Roaming allows you to use mobile data without swapping SIM cards while traveling abroad.
"Mi Roaming is updating. After updates are complete, you'll get access to all its features."
"Data packages are sold out. Try again later."
Make sure you have the following before you use your Mi Fan card
Mi Roaming - Mi Fan card activation
"You can activate your card later in Home screen > Mi Roaming"

"Mi Fan card benefits: • Get 15 CNY worth of call minutes in your first month and 6 month without monthly payments • Get 50 CNY worth of call minutes and a 3-month Mi Video subscription when you top up your account with 50 CNY for the first time • Activate now and get a 6-month Mi Cloud membership"
"Hey there! You have a Mi Fan card in your device. You're just a couple steps away from the perks it brings!"
"There's a Mi Fan card in your device. You can activate it now.​"
"Contact customer service if your order isn't generated within 10 minutes."
Various payment methods require 4%-35% transaction fee. They will be added to the price and displayed as the total amount before you complete your payment.
You can view package details in the package list
Mi Roaming needs permissions to take photos, videos, and record sound in order to complete ID verification.
Mi Roaming needs access to device information (IMEI, IMSI, etc.) to activate services. Give Mi Roaming the required permissions.
%1$s data package is about to expire
Mi Roaming data package is about to expire
Your Mi Roaming package is used up. Mobile data is turned off now.
Use mobile data without swapping SIM cards
Use mobile data without swapping SIM cards
Always stay connected with Mi Roaming
Try Mi Roaming to save on mobile data fees
%1$s data package will be used up soon
Mi Roaming data package will be used up soon
Looks like you need local mobile data. Try Mi Roaming.
"Fix issues when your SIM card can't connect to the network after using Mi Roaming"
Connect SIM card to the network
Refund will go through within 7 working days
To activate Mi Roaming, verify your Mi Account ID (%1$s).
Creating network profile. This might take several minutes.

After you revoke authorization, the app will stop collecting data, and all the related data will be deleted from both this device and the servers. This might make the app virtually unusable. Revoke authorization anyway?
International roaming;international traffic;Internet;data roaming;abroad;horizon pass;happy card;outbound;Finder Priceline;Wi-Fi;booking;air travel
No network, please check the settings
A server error occurred. Wait a minute or two and try again.
Connect to mobile data networks while roaming
"Couldn't turn on. Looks like you haven't arrived at your destination."
"There isn't enough data on your balance. Get another data package."
Your data package expired. Renew Mi Roaming.
"There isn't enough data on your balance. Buy a data package."
Activate Mi Roaming after arriving at your destination
Removing your SIM card will turn off Mi Roaming
Signing out will turn off Mi Roaming
Mi Roaming data package is used up
Mi Roaming data package has expired
Turning on Airplane mode will turn off Mi Roaming
Rebooting your device will turn off Mi Roaming
"Thank you for using Mi Roaming! We're waiting for your next trip!"
"Rate your order. It will help us improve our services."
You can activate your Mi Fan card now.
"In order to use Mi Roaming, you need to update Mi Roaming's security component. This will take about 2MB of mobile data."
Card data is corrupted. In order to activate Mi Roaming, you need to connect to the network (preferably via Wi-Fi) and reload the access info.
Access info is corrupted, reload it.
"Use mobile data without swapping SIM cards while traveling abroad. You can find Mi Roaming in your phone's Settings."
"Disabling this data package won't stop the billing. Disable now?"
"After you activate Mi Roaming, billing will start and you won't be able to get a refund. Activate now?"
"You're about to turn off and replace your SIM card with Mi Roaming. After you activate Mi Roaming, billing will start and you won't be able to get a refund. Activate now?"
"Mi Roaming will turn off and replace your SIM card. After you activate Mi Roaming, billing will start and you won't be able to get a refund. Activate now?"
"Looks like you haven't arrived at your destination yet, Mi Roaming may not work in your current location. Activate anyway?"
"Looks like you haven't arrived at your destination yet"
Mi Roaming error occurred. Reboot your device to fix the error. Reboot now?
"Use mobile data without swapping SIM cards. Try Mi Roaming when you travel."

"1.请确保是合约本人在操作，其他人无法通过验证。
2.请确保在光照充足的地方操作，光线太暗或太强可能会导致失败。
3.请按照提示完成相应动作。
"
Looks like you switched Mi Accounts. Your may not be able to use Mi SIM mobile data. Previous account: %1$s. Current account: 2$s.
"Fees will be deducted from phone's balance"
"Your current balance is %1$s. It's not enough for a purchase."
Remaining data will expire at the end of the month
Add Mi SIM shortcut to your Home screen. You can also do this in the Settings.
Forbid to add Home screen shortcut
To turn on mobile data, turn off Airplane mode first.
Adding data, wait for a minute or two.
Wait for a minute or two
Activating Mi SIM… No need physical card
You can only top up current Mi SIM
Turn off Airplane mode before activating Mi SIM
Set your physical SIM card as the data card to always stay connected.
"This month's Mi SIM data is used up. Switched back to your physical SIM card."
"This month's Mi SIM data is used up. Switch back to your physical SIM card or connect to Wi-Fi."
Reboot device to turn on Dual SIM mode. Otherwise Mi SIM will occupy one of the slots. Reboot now?
You can switch to Dual SIM mode
"Don't reboot. Mi SIM will occupy SIM slot."
Reboot and switch to Dual SIM
Turn off Airplane mode before turning off Mi SIM.
Turn off Airplane mode before using Mi SIM.
"Can't use Mi SIM while Mi Roaming is on. Turn off Mi Roaming."
"One free SIM slot is required for Mi SIM. Looks like you're using both slots. Follow instructions if you choose to complete purchase."
"Looks like you're using mobile data on <font color=#03a9f4>%1$s</font>. Replace it with Mi SIM?"
Mi SIM is activated. Airplane mode is on.
Sign in to Mi Account %1$s to continue
Read and agree to Mi SIM User Agreement.
In accordance with our policies, you should verify your ID.

"• China Telecom cards aren't compatible with Mi SIM. • You'll be billed on the first day of every month automatically. • The data remaining at the end of the month will expire only at the end of the next month. • We currently provide mobile data plans. Voice calls and text messages aren't supported yet. • You should verify your ID to start using Mi SIM."
Mi SIM is off. Turn it on again.
Check your network connection and try again
"To avoid additional data fees, set Mi SIM as your default SIM."
"Can't connect to the network. Looks like Mi SIM is off, or Mi SIM mobile data is used up."
"Can't connect to the network. Turn on mobile data."
Mobile data is off. You can turn it on manually.
Switched successfully. Activate Mi SIM now.
Use mobile data without a SIM card
Needs permissions to take photos to complete ID verification。
Solve issues with your SIM card after using Mi SIM.
"Apply for a refund now? You can also do that after this month's data is used up."
"Can't apply for a refund at the last day of the month."
"Can't activate Mi SIM while Mi Roaming is on. If you're not abroad, turn off Mi Roaming."
"The name you entered doesn't match your ID"
Check if your name and ID No. are correct
"<font color=#ff5816>Couldn't scan ID. Try uploading photos.</font>"
Use mobile data without a SIM card
This service has been stopped. Follow instructions on the start page to restore it.
"Renew when there's less than 50MB of data remaining"
"Add a bank card to top up phone's balance automatically"
Tell your Mi SIM number to the customer support
Add a Home screen shortcut to find Mi SIM faster.
Add Mi SIM shortcut to your Home screen
Use the Notification shade \"Data usage\" widget to manage your data.
An error occurred, activate Mi SIM manually.
Updating mobile data, wait for a minute or two.
Stable and fast mobile data connection
and allow access to the network

"请缓慢右转 随后正对屏幕"
"请左右摇头 随后正对屏幕"
"请缓慢抬头 随后正对屏幕"
